nodes.text: The Kharvashark Ruins were a location on the southern hemisphere of the planet Vrant Tarnum, in the Stygmarn system. Long before the High Republic Era, members of the Elders of the Path hid half of an ancient relic in a cave on the ruins' outskirts. Elder Tromak later told Krix Kamerat the location of the relic in order to keep the information safe.
